select.label: Q_USAGE_TOT
select.title: When you're buying Non-Chocolate Halloween candy for Trick or Treating, what is the most important factor in purchasing?
select.comment: Rank from most to least important.
select.row: Single Brand offering (i.e., Skittles only, Nerds only, Starburst only)
Multiple Brands offering (i.e. - Skittles, Starburst or Nerds, Trolli, SweeTARTS)
Piece count (i.e.. - 100 or 200 pieces per bag)
Price per piece count (i.e. - 30 cents per piece)
Type of candy (i.e. - fun/treat size vs. lollipop)
Flavors of the candy in the bag (sweet vs. sour)
select.noanswer: None of these â€“ I do not buy Non-Chocolate Halloween candy for Trick or Treating
